titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Edward G. Vanatta (1862-1939) was a scientific draftsman for the Conchological collection at the Academy for nearly 40 years.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of papers of Edward G. Vanetta (1903-1931). Included are: notes, sketches, and a small number of photographs; lists of species and specimens; reprints of articles by Vanatta and others; a subscription ledger for the Conchology section of the Academy of Natural Sciences (1903-1927); and a printing block of shells.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
